title: Please Get Your Noise Out of My Ears (Ep. 439 Update)
description: The pandemic provided city dwellers with a break from the din of the modern world. Now the noise is coming back. What does that mean for our productivity, health, and basic sanity?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The pandemic provided city dwellers with a break from the din of the modern world. Now the noise is coming back. What does that mean for our productivity, health, and basic sanity?
